t:
She sat there on the bed singing
a lullaby to our daughter.

When I entered angrily, banging the door, she whispered,
      “Sshhh! You'll wake her up.”



“Come back to your senses,” I lost it. “It's been five days that she's dead. The body is starting to rot.”
c:
I did a bad job with this.



#wife #dead #daughter #cantaccept #madness #love #sleep #forever
